nodes.text: Kristian Harloff is an American producer, writer and movie reviewer. He is the co-creator of a film review website called Schmoes Know, director of development at Collider and correspondent on Fandango. He has interviewed Star Wars actors as the co-host of Collider Jedi Council, a weekly Star Wars show on Collider. The planet Harloff Minor was named after him, which first appeared in the 2016 novel Bloodline by the author Claudia Gray.
